short_description: Identifies negative frames and generates positive alternatives for a more constructive worldview.
description: This pattern analyzes input text to identify negative mental frames, then generates positive alternative frames. It helps users shift their perspective from pessimistic to optimistic, encouraging a more constructive and empowering worldview. The pattern is particularly useful for personal development, cognitive restructuring, and improving mental well-being.
usage_example: echo 'I failed my exam, I'm never going to succeed in life' | fabric -p create_better_frame
